INDUCTION THERAPY : Patients receive methotrexate intravenously ( IV ) day 1 ; vincristine IV asparaginase intramuscularly ( IM ) day 2 ; oral dexamethasone day 1-10 ; alemtuzumab subcutaneously ( SC ) day 1 , 4 , 7 .
